title: El Niño and La Niña Alert System
content:
On the second Thursday of each month, scientists with NOAA’s Climate Prediction Center in collaboration with forecasters at the International Research Institute for Climate and Society (IRI) release an official update on the status of the El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO for short). Here is a description of the categories and criteria they use.
